definition: to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
to plot/to scheme/to bring about/to engineer/planning/producer/planner
to assign/to allocate/to transfer (money to an account)
to put forward plans and ideas (also derogatory)/to give advice (idiom)
to damage by scratching/to gash/to lacerate

sentences.english: Do you think matches striking causes pineapple to fall.
sentences.chinese: 你們認爲劃火柴導致菠蘿掉下？

sentences.english: This will be announced to the world tomorrow, putting an end to the whole saga .
sentences.chinese: 明天整個世界將明朗，這段傳奇故事劃上句號。

sentences.english: You'd better mark a white line there beforehand.
sentences.chinese: 你最好事先在那裏劃一條白線。

sentences.english: This means you are permanently taking time away from your home life and putting it into your work life.
sentences.chinese: 這意味着你總是要把時間從生活劃到工作中去。

sentences.english: One part of the Serpentine is kept for swimmers.
sentences.chinese: 蜿蜒河的一段劃爲游泳區。

sentences.english: Row row row your boat, gently down the stream.
sentences.chinese: 劃劃劃你的船，緩緩地流向小溪。

sentences.english: I slide my hand along the wall and flick on a switch.
sentences.chinese: 我就用手在牆上輕撫着，劃到開關處，開了燈。

sentences.english: Even gondoliers tend to hang up their paddles early.
sentences.chinese: 即便是那些劃平底船的船伕也早早就準備着收槳了。

sentences.english: Do not strike matches or lighters, try to avoid coughing whilst your opponent is at the table.
sentences.chinese: 當你的對手在臺面擊球時，不能劃火柴或點燃打火機。

sentences.english: This strategic plan is like a thousand knives of the enemy, so that they bleed to death.
sentences.chinese: 這一戰略就像對敵人劃一千刀，讓他們流血至死。

sentences.english: Draw a line from A to B.
Don't strike a match;I can smell gas.
sentences.chinese: 不要劃火柴，我聞到煤氣味。

sentences.english: The total revenue includes the income tax turned over to central government since 2003.
sentences.chinese: 財政收入從2003年起包括上劃中央所得稅收入。

sentences.english: Then I rowed it as fast as I could till I reached Jackson's Island.
sentences.chinese: 然後，我使盡全力，以最快的速度劃到傑克森島。

sentences.english: They were pulling hard for the small island.
Get the last stroke over and your hand on the wall as fast as you possibly can.
sentences.chinese: 盡你所能用最快的速度劃最後一劃和伸手觸壁。

definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
to handle/to treat/to deal with/to process/to deal with a criminal case/to mete out punishment/to offer for sale at a reduced price/to punish
to overlap/to superimpose/to telescope/to run together/to duplicate/one over another/superposition/an overlap/redundancy/reduplication (in Chinese grammar, e.g. 散散步[san4 san4 bu4] to have a stroll)
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed
